segments.text: I notice the window above the sink, looking out onto a garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside scene appears so calm and meticulously kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a tidy path with lovely bushes and plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the kitchen interior is truly stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, water is pouring onto the floor, making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are putting themselves in such a perilous position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's unsettling to see such domestic chaos hidden from the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of dread for whatâ€™s about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tranquility outside seems to mock the impending accidents inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Surely someone will slip, or that stool will finally give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a ticking time bomb of small disasters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, but I'm just an observer.
segments.speaker: PAR
